title: Duo Top
body:
I am a level 30 player in League that likes to mess around. Taking Tanks mid, supporting as an assassin and going ADC as a Jungler. Is there any rule that says that I cannot go duo top with a friend? Does a jungler have an impact on the game that a Duo top cannot replicate? Please answer this thought as soon a possible!

{{champion:157}} {{champion:154}}  Duo Top would be nice

replies.body: Duo top can replicate the pressure a jungler gives off with roams, it can't replicate the Gold efficiency Exp efficiency and security a jungler brings with smite and buff transfers. However a strat is a better than your opponents and you'll win i've smurfed and won Duo Jungle in Gold ranked with sucess and Malzahar Zed bot. (Hold him down while i blow him up) :)

The "meta" of 1-1-1-2 is to share gold and exp around the champions evenly and efficiently.

You can definitely go duo top and I have seen it work, buts its not efficient.

If you want Zac and Yas the Zac can just jungle and camp top. Whats the difference?
Also if they were duo top, it would take even longer for Yas to hit 6 which is what that partnership is all about.
